mapper.select: select s_base_select_item.title as title, s_base_select_item.id as id, s_base_select_item.created_by as created_by, (select concat('{"id":"', sbsi.id, '","pid":"', sbsi.pid, '","title":"', sbsi.title, '"}') from s_base_select_item sbsi where (sbsi.id = s_base_select_item.pid)) AS pid, s_base_select_item.deleted as deleted, s_base_select_item.description as description, s_base_select_item.updated_at as updated_at, s_base_select_item.updated_by as updated_by, s_base_select_item.sort as sort, s_base_select_item.item_value as item_value, s_base_select_item.created_at as created_at from s_base_select_item s_base_select_item where s_base_select_item.id = #{selectItemId} and s_base_select_item.deleted = false
select * from s_base_select_item where pid = #{pid} and deleted = false

SELECT * FROM s_base_select_item sbsi WHERE FIND_IN_SET( sbsi.id, ( SELECT SUBSTRING( @pid FROM LOCATE(',', @pid) + 1 FOR LENGTH(@pid) ) AS pid FROM ( SELECT u0.id, u0.pid, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(u0.pid ,@pid), @count := @count + 1, 0 ) AS total_childern, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(u0.pid ,@pid), @pid := CONCAT(@pid, ',', u0.id), 0 ) AS childern FROM ( SELECT * FROM s_base_select_item bsi WHERE bsi.deleted = FALSE ORDER BY bsi.pid, bsi.id ) u0, ( SELECT @pid := #{pid}) u1, ( SELECT @count := 1) u2 ) u3 LIMIT 1 ) ) ORDER BY sbsi.sort DESC
